set(3rdParty_folder "3rdParty")
option(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS ON)

find_package(Vulkan REQUIRED)
if (NOT Vulkan_FOUND)
	message(FATAL_ERROR "vulkan not found")
elseif(NOT Vulkan_glslangValidator_FOUND)
	message(FATAL_ERROR "vulkan shader compiler not found")
elseif(NOT Vulkan_INCLUDE_DIR)
	message(FATAL_ERROR "vulkan include not found")
endif()
if(PAPER_ENGINE_WINDOW_VENDOR STREQUAL "GLFW" AND NOT TARGET glfw)
    option(GLFW_BUILD_EXAMPLES "" OFF)
    option(GLFW_BUILD_TESTS "" OFF)
    option(GLFW_BUILD_DOCS "" OFF)
    option(GLFW_INSTALL "" OFF)
    add_subdirectory(glfw EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
    set_target_properties(glfw PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/glfw)
    set_target_properties(update_mappings PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/glfw)
endif()

if (NOT TARGET spdlog)
    option(SPDLOG_BUILD_EXAMPLE "" OFF)
    option(SPDLOG_INSTALL "" OFF)
    add_subdirectory(spdlog EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
    set_target_properties(spdlog PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/spdlog)
endif()
if(NOT TARGET SDL3)
    add_subdirectory(SDL EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
    set_target_properties(SDL_uclibc PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/SDL3)
	if (SDL_SHARED)
		set_target_properties(SDL3-shared PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/SDL3)
	endif()
endif()

if (NOT TARGET glm)
    option(GLM_BUILD_TESTS "" OFF)
    option(GLM_BUILD_INSTALL "" OFF)
	add_subdirectory(glm EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
	set_target_properties(glm PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/glm)
endif()

if (NOT TARGET vk-bootstrap)
    option(VK_BOOTSTRAP_INSTALL "" OFF)
	if (CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME STREQUAL "Linux" AND BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
		set(VK_BOOTSTRAP_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
	endif()
	add_subdirectory(vk-bootstrap EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
	set_target_properties(vk-bootstrap PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/vk-bootstrap)

endif()

if (NOT TARGET nvrhi)
    option(NVRHI_INSTALL "" OFF)
	option(NVRHI_WITH_VULKAN "" ON)
	if (CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME STREQUAL "Linux" AND BUILD_SHARED_LIBS)
		set(NVRHI_BUILD_SHARED ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
	endif()
	add_subdirectory(NVRHI)
	set_target_properties(nvrhi PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/NVRHI)
	if (_WIN32)
		set_target_properties(nvrhi_vk PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/NVRHI)
		set_target_properties(nvrhi_d3d11 PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/NVRHI)
		set_target_properties(nvrhi_d3d12 PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/NVRHI)
		set_target_properties(DirectX-Guids PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/NVRHI)
		set_target_properties(DirectX-Headers PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/NVRHI)
	endif()
endif()

option(ENTT_INCLUDE_HEADERS "" ON)
add_subdirectory(entt)

if (NOT TARGET imgui)
	set(imgui_SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui)
	
    add_library(imgui INTERFACE)
    target_include_directories(imgui INTERFACE ${imgui_SOURCE_DIR})
    target_include_directories(imgui INTERFACE ${Vulkan_INCLUDE_DIR})
    set_target_properties(imgui PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/imgui)
endif()

if (NOT TARGET stb)
	set(stb_SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/stb)
	add_library(stb INTERFACE)
    target_include_directories(stb INTERFACE ${stb_SOURCE_DIR})
    set_target_properties(stb PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/stb)
	
endif()

if (NOT TARGET assimp)
    option(ASSIMP_BUILD_TESTS "" OFF)
    option(ASSIMP_INSTALL "" OFF)
    option(ASSIMP_INSTALL_PDB "" OFF)
	#set(_assimp_output_dir "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}")
	set(ASSIMP_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}" CACHE PATH "" FORCE)
	#set(ASSIMP_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/$<CONFIGURATION>")
	add_subdirectory(assimp EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
	set_target_properties(assimp PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/assimp)
	if(_WIN32)
		set_target_properties(zlibstatic PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/assimp)
	endif()
endif()

# thread pool
option(TP_BUILD_TESTS OFF)
option(TP_BUILD_EXAMPLES OFF)
option(TP_BUILD_BENCHMARKS OFF)
add_subdirectory(thread-pool)
set_target_properties(thread-pool PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/dp-thread-pool)

# BS thread pool
add_library(BS_thread_pool INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(BS_thread_pool INTERFACE bs-thread-pool/include)
set_target_properties(BS_thread_pool PROPERTIES FOLDER ${3rdParty_folder}/BSThreadPool)
